Context: The George Brown College offers facilities with up-to-date technology and industry standards for hands-on training. They provide both full-time and part-time training options. Their faculty is comprised of working professionals in their respective industries, including celebrated chefs, Red Seal Qualified tradespeople, and professional engineers. The college is located in Toronto, Canada's largest city and one of the most diverse cities in the world. They develop curriculum with important input from industry partners and offer apprenticeship programs that combine hands-on learning in school with on-the-job training in the workplace. Students can get started through the Accelerated Ontario Youth Apprenticeship Program (OYAP) for Secondary School students by applying through their high schools. For more information, contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or visit their social media hub. Their website is subject to change without notice. Phone: 416-415-2000; TTY: 1-877-515-5559.
